C

calculateOrderItemValue(OrderItem) - Method in interface system.Calculator
Calculate value of an order item, which is calculated by: article.unitPrice * number of units ordered.
calculateOrderItemVAT(OrderItem) - Method in interface system.Calculator
Calculate the included VAT of an order item calculated by the applicable tax rate and the calculated order item value.
calculateOrderValue(Order) - Method in interface system.Calculator
Calculate value of an order, which is comprised of the value of each ordered item.
calculateOrderVAT(Order) - Method in interface system.Calculator
Calculate VAT of an order, which is comprised of the VAT of each ordered item.
calculateVAT(long, TAX) - Method in interface system.Calculator
Calculate included VAT (Value-Added Tax) from a gross price/value based on a tax rate (VAT is called "Mehrwertsteuer" (MwSt.) in Germany).
Calculator - Interface in system
Calculator is a singleton system component that performs calculations.
count() - Method in interface system.Repository
Return the current number of objects in repository.
customers() - Method in interface system.DataStore
Return repository of customers.

D

DataStore - Interface in system
DataStore is a singleton system component that stores collections of datamodel objects such as objects of classes Customer, Article and Order.

I

IoC - Interface in system
Interface of an "Inversion-of-Control" (IoC) container, which creates and contains system component objects such as Calculator, DataStore, Formatter and Printer.

Printer - Interface in system
